AppArtifact.title: AppArtifact
AppArtifact.description: Represents an application artifact. The artifact itself is hosted externally, and its metadata is stored in Firestore.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AppArtifact entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the application.

downloadUrl.description: The direct download URL for the artifact.

createdAt.description: A timestamp indicating when the application artifact was created.

definition.description: Stores app artifact metadata. Publicly readable, but only writable by authenticated admins.

params.name: appArtifactId
params.description: The unique identifier for the app artifact.
